fragment.sub_volume_note: SCRIPTORES AETATIS INCERTAE EX ORDINE LITERARUM
fragment.author: MONIMUS
fragment.witness: Clemens Alex. Protr. c. 3, p. 12, 33 Sylb.:
fragment.text: Μόνιμος δ ̓ ἱστορεῖ ἐν τῇ τῶν Θαυμασίων συναγωγῇ, ἐν Πέλλῃ τῆς Θετταλίας Ἀχαιὸν ἄνθρωπον Πηλεῖ καὶ Χείρωνι καταθύεσθαι.
fragment.translation: Monimus in Mirabilium collectione narrat in Pella Thessalica Achaeum hominem Peleo et Chironi immolatum esse.

fragment.sub_volume_note: SCRIPTORES AETATIS INCERTAE EX ORDINE LITERARUM
fragment.author: MONIMUS
fragment.witness: Eadem Cyrill. C. Jul. IV, p. 128, C ita:
fragment.text: Ἱστορεῖ δὲ καὶ Μώνυμος ἐν τῇ τῶν Θαυμασίων συναγωγῇ, Πηλεῖ καὶ Χείρωνι καταθύεσθαί τινας ἐν Πελλήνῃ τῆς Θρᾴκης.
fragment.commentary: De Monimo Syracusano, Diogenis cynici discipulo, v. Diogen. L. VI, 82 sq. Joan. Damascius p. 42 Appendicis ad Stob. Floril. ed. Gaisf. Monimus, Pythionis f., ap. Phylarch. (fr. 18) in Athenaeo p. 609, B. Alius in inscr. ap. Burckhardt. Reisen in Syrien vol. I, p. 448, laudante Dindorfio in Steph. Thes. s. v. Μόνιμος.
